title: Bitcoin Fell Below $100,000 This Weekend Amid ‘Escalating Geopolitical Uncertainty’
description: Bitcoin prices dropped below $100,000 this weekend as global markets responded to the latest developments in the conflict between Iran and Israel.
content:
Bitcoin prices declined below the $100,000 this weekend.
